channel.title: Sicario
channel.desc: When the war against drugs escalates at the border of the USA and Mexico, an impractical FBI agent gets commissioned by the government, where she is exposed to harsh truths.

channel.title: Who Am I
channel.desc: A lonely hacker who dreams of being a superhero becomes part of a cyber group. However, his life turns upside down when the group becomes involved in causing a threat to national security.

channel.title: The Other Guys
channel.desc: When two disgraced police officers are given a task to probe a case involving an evil magnate, they must put aside their differences to become like the top detectives they idolise.

channel.title: Matilda
channel.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.
